Curt Schilling, whose video-game company failed this year, put his 26-acre estate up for sale, with an asking price of $3.45 million, his agent said. (Boston Globe)

Dog in car's grill survives 11-mile ride

Animal welfare authorities said a dog survived an 11-mile ride from Mass. to R.I. after it was hit by a car and became wedged under the front grill. (Boston Globe)
